titles.title: National DWI Victims Memorial Designation Act of 2010
A bill to designate the Memorial of Perpetual Tears, which honors victims of driving while impaired, as the official National DWI Victims Memorial.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 5/26/2010--Introduced. National DWI Victims Memorial Designation Act of 2010 - Designates the Memorial of Perpetual Tears, located adjacent to Interstate 40 in Moriarity, New Mexico, as the National DWI Victims Memorial.
